.. installation:

Installation
============

From the source directory, run: `python setup.py install`

The `oncotools` package has the following peer dependencies:

  - `pyodbc <https://github.com/mkleehammer/pyodbc>`_
  - `numpy <http://www.numpy.org/>`_
  - `matplotlib <http://matplotlib.org/>`_ (for visualization)
  - `pandas <http://pandas.pydata.org/>`_
  - `scikit-learn <http://scikit-learn.org/>`_
  - `schema <https://github.com/keleshev/schema>`_

Run the tests with `python test.py`
